title: Champion select is becoming broken in the past few weeks...
body: This has happened a few times now. I'm in ranked champion select, waiting for my turn to pick. Suddenly, the timer freezes and I'm unable to pick my champ with a wonderful message of "You were removed from the game for failing to select a champ".

replies.body: ive also repaired client and its still fucking happening riot fucking fix you fucking shit!

no ingame lag, this happens to me the counter just drops to 0 and thats it. nothing no one else selecting nothing happens but all you get to see is an error message that comes up after u should have selected to let you know the error has been sent and then thats when you know you can kiss your fucking lp goodbye
